maqras.text: Tashikana shinjitsu
tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka
Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Samudo to ado (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita
Sore de samudo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta
Mata ado wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta
Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yo ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou
Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka
Mata firuaun ya kare izen no mono ya horobosa reta sho toshi (no min) mo, tsumi o okashite ita
Kare-ra wa omo no shito ni shitagawanainode, kare wa moretsuna chobatsu de kare-ra o shobatsu shita
Omizu no toki, ware ga hakobune de anata gata o hakonda no wa
sore o anata gata e no kyokun to sa se, chuibukai mimi ga sore o (kii te) kioku ni todomeru tamedearu
Sore de rappa ga ichi fuki fuka reta toki
daichi ya yamayama wa mochiage rare, ichigeki de konagona ni kudaka re
sonohi (ichidai) jiken ga okoru
Mata ozora wa chiji ni sakeru. Ten ga moroku yowai hidearou
Tenshi-tachi wa, sono (ten no) hashibashi ni ori, sonohi, 8-ri (no tenshi) ga kare-ra no ue ni, anata no omo no gyokuza o ninaudearou
Sonohi anata gata wa (shinpan no tame) mina Ââù Ki-dashi ni sa re nanihitotsu to shite kakushi osenaidearou
Sore de migite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Koko ni (kite), anata gata wa watashi no (gyojo)-ki o yome
Izure watashi (shinja) no seisan (shinpan) ni au koto ga, hontoni wakatte ita
Koshite kare wa shifukuna seikatsu ni hitari
takai (oka no)-en no naka de
samazamana kajitsu ga tedjika ni aru
Anata gata wa, sugisatta hi (gense) de okonatta (zenko no) tame ni, man'etsu shite tabe, katsu nome.'(To iwa reyou)
daga hidarite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `A , watashi no (gyojo)-ki ga watasa renakattanaraba
Watashi wa jibun no seisan ga, don'na monodearu ka o shiranakatta
A, sono (shi) ga,(watashi no) shumatsudeattanaraba
tomi wa, watashi ni yakudatanakatta
Ken'i wa, watashi katara kieusete shimatta
(Daga genmei ga kudarou. ) `Kare o toraete, shibare
Sore kara moesakaru hi de, kare o yake
Sarani 70 wanshaku no naga-sa no kusari de., Kare o make
Hontoni kare wa, idainaru arra o shinjizu
mata hinja o yashinau koto o susumenakatta
Sorede kono hi kare wa, soko ni tomo wa naku
mata, kegarawashi fuhai-mono no soto ni shokumotsu wanai
sore o taberu no wa, tsumibito dakedearu
Ware wa, anata gataga mi eru mono ni oite chikai
mata anata gataga mi enai mono ni oite chikau
Hontoni kore wa, sonkina shito no kotobadearu
Kore wa shijin no kotobade wanai. Daga anata gata wa, hotondo shinjinai
Mata, uranaishi no kotoba demonai. Shikashi anata gata wa hotondo ki ni moshi nai
(Koreha) ban'yu no nushi kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Moshi kare (shito) ga, ware ni kanshite nanrakano kotoba o netsuzo surunaraba
ware wa kitto kare no migite o torae
kare no keidomyaku o kanarazu kirudearou
Anata gata no naka, darehitori, kare o mamotte yarenai nodearu
Hontoni kore wa,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkaidearu
Ware wa anata gata no naka,(sore o) kyohi suru mono o shiru
Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, fushin-sha ni totte wa kanashimi (no tane)dearou
Daga sore wa, hontoni kakkotaru fudo no shinridearu
Dakara shidainaru okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Aru mono ga, kudarubeki chobatsu ni tsuite tou
Fushinjin-sha wa, sore o fusegu koto wa dekinai
Kaidan no shu, arra kara (no chobatsu)dearu
Tenshi-tachi ya seirei (dai tenshi jiburiru) wa, tsuitachi ni shite, kare no moto ni noboru, sono (tsuitachi no) naga-sa wa, 5 man-nendearu
Dakara anata wa, rippa ni taeshinobe
Hontoni kare-ra wa, sore (Ni~Tsu) o toi to omou
Shikashi ware wa, sore o chikai to miru
Ten ga toketa do no yo ni naru hi
yamayama wa, suita yomo no yo ni nari
dare mo tomo (no anpi) o tou koto wanai
Kare-ra wa tagaini kao o awaseru koto ga dekinai hodo osoreru. Tsumi aru mono wa sonohi, jibun no tsumiwoaganau tame ni jibun no kodomo-tachi o sashidasou to negaudearou
Kare no tsuma ya kyodai
kare o kabatta kinshin
jibun o sukuerunaraba, chijo no subete no mono o agete aganau koto o koi negaudearou
Danjite dekinai. Hontoni kano (jigoku no) hono wa
atama no kawa made ken gi toru
(Seigi ni) se o misete, somuki satta-sha o shokan surudearou
Mata chikuseki shi, intoku no kin o motsu mono o mo
